attributes.additional_details:
Prisoners get 3 hot meals a day, a shower, heating lighting, access to gym, doctors,library, supervision at all times, CCTV in case of accident or incident and free legal advice and education and entertainment.

Pensioners are lucky to have 1 hot meal per day, minimal heating and lighting, no social interaction, little if any contact with others and there are no safety precations at all regarding their welfare. The only break they receive is the far to common trip to hypothermia due to being unable to heat their homes.

This is barbarrick and unexeptable.

Further more as tax payers we have no right to decide on where or how our money is spent.
